RelatedSentence: Imports have gone up as prices of both block rubber and sheet rubber in the international market are lower as compared to domestic prices , a senior rubber board official said .
About 95 per cent of rubber imported is used by tyre manufacturers and the country imports a big chunk of rubber from Vietnam and Indonesia .
